original_title: 週末、両親不在で… 僕の部屋は爆乳ビッチ達の溜まり場と化した。
overview: The girl student council visits this guy’s house, while his parents are away.  He then wins the lottery of life, when then the girls find it humourous to flash their panties at him…
title: That Weekend, While My Parents Were Away ... My Room Turned Into A Hangout Spot For Colossal Tits Bitches.
